deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @notice Contract owner. Has the ability to reset the state of the contract.
@notice Array of adopters. The index corresponds to the pet id.
@notice A pet with the specified id has been adopted by its new owner.
@notice The shop was reset, all adopters have been erased.
@notice To adopt a pet, its id must be valid. There are only 16 pets to be adopted.
@notice An already adopted pet cannot be readopted.
@notice Sets the sender as the contract owner.
@notice Allows the sender to adopt a pet.
@notice Returns the whole list of adopters.
@dev Clears the adopters array. Avoids the need to deploy a new contract instance.
@notice Contract owner. Has the ability to reset the state of the contract.
@notice Array of adopters. The index corresponds to the pet id.
@notice A pet with the specified id has been adopted by its new owner.
@notice The shop was reset, all adopters have been erased.
@notice To adopt a pet, its id must be valid. There are only 16 pets to be adopted.
@notice An already adopted pet cannot be readopted.
@notice Sets the sender as the contract owner.
@notice Allows the sender to adopt a pet.
@notice Returns the whole list of adopters.
@dev Clears the adopters array. Avoids the need to deploy a new contract instance.

reset().details: Clears the adopters array. Avoids the need to deploy a new contract instance.

PetAlreadyAdopted().notice: An already adopted pet cannot be readopted.

PetDoesNotExist().notice: To adopt a pet, its id must be valid. There are only 16 pets to be adopted.

PetAdopted(uint256,address).notice: A pet with the specified id has been adopted by its new owner.

PetShopReset().notice: The shop was reset, all adopters have been erased.

adopt(uint256).notice: Allows the sender to adopt a pet.

adopters(uint256).notice: Array of adopters. The index corresponds to the pet id.

constructor.notice: Sets the sender as the contract owner.

getAdopters().notice: Returns the whole list of adopters.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows anyone to adopt a pet. A pet can only be adopted once and there are only 16 different pets. The purpose of this simple contract is to provide a simple dapp exemple for which a web interface can be written.
